quizzes.name: Budgeting Basics
quizzes.description: Learning how to budget well using tools such as Microsoft Excel.
quizzes.introduction: As you learned in the video lesson, budgeting basics is all about planning what to do with your money. Now let’s see how well you remember the material we covered.

questions.question: World War I began in which year?
questions.quiz_answer: The World War I began in 1914

questions.question: The Magna Carta was published by the King of which country?
questions.quiz_answer: The Magna Carta was published by the King of England

questions.question: The first successful printing press was developed by ...
questions.quiz_answer: The first successful printing press was developed by Johannes Gutenburg

questions.question: Which Roman Emperor built a massive wall across Northern Britain in 122 A.D.?
questions.quiz_answer: The Roman Emperor who built a massive wall across Northern Britain in 122 A.D. was Hadrian

questions.question: Who was the first Western explorer to reach China?
questions.quiz_answer: The first Western explorer to reach China was Marco Polo

quizzes.name: Resume Building
quizzes.introduction: As you learned in the video lesson, resume building is all about looking at your experience and catering it correctly. Now let’s see how well you remember the material we covered.

questions.question: Which of these countries covers the smallest total area?
questions.quiz_answer: The country which covers the smallest area from the listed is Italy

questions.question: Where in Chile is the Atacama Desert situated?
questions.quiz_answer: The Atacama Desert is situated in the North of Chile

questions.question: Which island in the Atlantic has one of the world's highest volcanic mountains?
questions.quiz_answer: The island in the Atlantic with one of the world's highest volcanic mountains is Tenerife

quizzes.name: Health & Wellness
quizzes.description: Learning to maintain health and wellness, mindfully.
quizzes.introduction: As you learned in the video lesson, maintaining health & wellness starts with the small things. Now let’s see how well you remember the material we covered.

questions.question: What did Yoda mean in saying "There is another"?
questions.quiz_answer: Yoda means there is another Skywalker

questions.question: What city is attacked in the 2008 film "Cloverfield"?
questions.quiz_answer: The city attacked is New York

questions.question: On the set of "Jaws", which character was nicknamed "Bruce"?
questions.quiz_answer: On the set of "Jaws", "The Shark" was nicknamed "Bruce"
